body_html:
I can gather the logs by setting tf.logging.set_verbosity('DEBUG')? - I missed changing this previously..

That would be sufficient.

I'll try making the exact copy of my script with the mnist_xla script but making use of all things like nccl for multi-gpu.

OK, thanks!
